intro: Parnassia simianshanensis, commonly known as the Simianshan Parnassia, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Ranunculaceae and is characterized by its striking white, cup-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as mountainous regions. Its leaves are simple and alternate, with a smooth texture. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
